verses.text: The \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add that there is\add* no \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* before his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

For he \w flattereth|strong="H2505"\w* himself in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, until his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* to be \w hateful|strong="H8130"\w*.\f + \fr 36.2 \ft until…: Heb. to find his iniquity to hate\f*

The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add are\add* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* and \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*: he hath left \w off|strong="H2308"\w* to be \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*, \add and\add* to do \w good|strong="H3190"\w*.

He \w deviseth|strong="H2803"\w* \w mischief|strong="H0205"\w* upon his \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*; he \w setteth|strong="H3320"\w* himself in a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add that is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; he \w abhorreth|strong="H3988"\w* not \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 36.4 \ft mischief: or, vanity\f*

Thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add is\add* in the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; \add and\add* thy \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* \add reacheth\add* unto the \w clouds|strong="H7834"\w*.

Thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add is\add* like the \w great|strong="H0410"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w*; thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou \w preservest|strong="H3467"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.\f + \fr 36.6 \ft the…: Heb. the mountains of God\f*

How \w excellent|strong="H3368"\w* \add is\add* thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*! therefore the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* put their \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* under the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of thy \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*.\f + \fr 36.7 \ft excellent: Heb. precious\f*

They shall be abundantly \w satisfied|strong="H7301"\w* with the \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w* of thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and thou shalt make them \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of thy \w pleasures|strong="H5730"\w*.\f + \fr 36.8 \ft abundantly…: Heb. watered\f*
For with thee \add is\add* the \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: in thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* shall we \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.

O \w continue|strong="H4900"\w* thy \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* unto them that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee; and thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* to the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 36.10 \ft continue: Heb. draw out at length\f*

Let not the \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* of \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against me, and let not the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w remove|strong="H5110"\w* me.

There are the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*: they are cast \w down|strong="H1760"\w*, and shall not be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*.
